Updating 5.3/6.0 Project Folders

In Version Manager 5.3/6.0, updating a project folder refreshed the contents of a project to reflect added or deleted files. Although this functionality is still supported for 5.3/6.0 project roots, it is no longer necessary with project databases. The contents of Version Manager project databases are kept up to date with added files, imported archives, and deleted versioned files.

When working with 5.3/6.0 project roots in the current edition of Version Manager, you can update the contents of a folder to refresh your view of files you've added or modified.

To update a 5.3/6.0 project folder:

  1. In the Project pane, select the 5.3/6.0 project you want to update.

  2. Select File | Update Project Folder.
